channel.title: Castle Wars Shop
channel.description:
//////////////////FIXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEDDDDDDDDDDDDDD///////////////////////
Well, it says "You need blabla castle wars points"
But then, you can buy with coins.
At first you needed tickets, but that didn't work. So I tried converting so that each game gives 5 points to winners, 2 pts draw, 2 pts to losers. But the shop items can be brought with coins. I tried everything, I even tried copying what the Assault shop had, exact same stuff but just changed the Shop ID etc.
Any help? :(
Been trying to fix this for the last 1 and a half hours..

item.title: Castle Wars Shop
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

You don’t need one for a shop… My “Assault Shop” works perfectly and doesn’t have one.

Read full topic

item.title: Castle Wars Shop
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

have you got a public void?

Read full topic
